Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 42nd overall pick, by Texas in 1981...
Injured on 6/5/1991 with a Strained Elbow Ligament, out for 1-2 weeks...
Earned first career win on 5/31/1992...
Traded from Texas to California on 7/7/1992 (Going to TEX: C G. Zaun, P L. Demery. Going to CAL: P D. Henry, P D. Eckersley, P L. Leal)...
